location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'PLAN OF A SITE OF A PROPOSED LIGHTHOUSE AT RAS-AL-ARZ. SCALE 100 FEET TO AN INCH'

mods.abstract: The plan shows the site of a proposed lighthouse at Ras al-Arz, Kuwait, drawn from the perspective of a number of sections. An insert plan shows the proposed sight in relation to and distance from the British Agency, Kuwait.The plan notes that it was surveyed and drawn by R L Laffere, Assistant Engineer, Persian Gulf sub-division.
